1.content:
You wake up, feeling like it's just any other day. You blink your eyes open, your vision still blurry with sleep. Rubbing the sleep out of your eyes, your groggy mind suddenly realizes something. As you bring your hands down in front of your face, you can't see them!

You look down, and you're horrified to see that your body is nowhere to be seen! You begin to panic. Are you dead? Are you now a disembodied mind? Fearful gasps escape your mouth, your heart thumping in your chest.

But you can feel your arms when you try to move them, and can feel your fingernails digging into the skin of your palm as you tightly squeeze your fists. That settles it then. You have somehow become invisible!

You honestly don't know how to feel about this. It's such a bizarre thing to have happen, your mind is racing with jumbled up thoughts, fears, as well as potential benefits. Is the power of invisibility a good thing to take advantage of? Or is it a living nightmare?

Where have you woken up?

1) At home, where you live with your girlfriend and her sister. Will you try (hopelessly) to avoid them sitting on you without their knowledge? Or do you want to know what it would feel like underneath them? Perhaps instead you'll venture outside and try to find someone to help you?

2) In the home of a average-sized redheaded gamer. As you see her enter the room, you realize that you're slumped against her gaming chair, the back of your head on the seat. Unbeknownst to you, she plans to stay seated for hours of gaming. Will you stay put, sit normally on the chair for a safer experience, or try to escape?

3) In a plush office. A tall, chubby blonde businesswoman walks in. As she approaches the desk, you realize that you're seated on her plush leather chair. Will you remain where you are, slump down to see what it would be like as a human butt cushion? Or get out of the way before she can squash you?

4) Laid on a queen-size bed. A brunette BBW plus-size model walks in, wearing sexy lingerie. Is she accompanied by photographers, ready for her to lay down for a shoot, requiring her to be in several positions on the area you currently occupy? Or is she coming to lay down and rest after a shoot, with you currently laid in her usual spot? Will you stay or go?

5) More options, including a celebrity section.

info.brief_description: You wake up invisible. Will you try to be sat on by or dodge the unaware women? Please add
info.description:
You wake up invisible. Will you take advantage of your newfound ability and try to end up underneath unaware, beautiful women? Or will you spend your time trying to avoid being squashed by curvy women who don't know you're there?

- The main character can change preferences through the story E.g. they might start the story wanting to be sat on, only to have it happen and hate it. Likewise they could start off trying to avoid being sat on, only to have it happen accidentally and enjoy it.
- Minimum of 1,000 characters per chapter.
- The main character can die, but only after six chapters.
- The main character can talk to the women and make them aware of their presence.
- The women cannot feel your presence while sitting on you, unless they know you're there (suggested by user MV4444)
- Any kind of body squashing is fine, it doesn't have to be focused solely on asses.
- If something you want to include is not mentioned in allowed/not allowed, go for it! If it's something I've overlooked which I'd rather not have, I'll message you before taking action.
- Try to avoid specifying the main character's gender unless absolutely necessary
- Have fun!

Allowed:
Ass squash

Not Allowed:
Men (main character aside)

Characters over 50
